#üêÑ Simulated Milk Production Data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(quarto) #install.packages("quarto")

set.seed(123)




milk_data <- tibble(
cow_id = rep(1:10, each = 30),
date = rep(seq(ymd("2025-09-01"), by = "day", length.out = 30), times = 10),
feed_kg = rnorm(300, mean = 20, sd = 3),
health_score = runif(300, 70, 100),
milk_yield = 10 + 0.5 * feed_kg + 0.2 * health_score + rnorm(300, 0, 2)
)




head(milk_data)
```

#üìä Daily Milk Yield per Cow

```{r}
milk_data %>%
ggplot(aes(x = date, y = milk_yield, color = factor(cow_id))) +
geom_line() +
theme_minimal() +
labs(title = "Daily Milk Yield per Cow", x = "Date", y = "Milk Yield (L)", color = "Cow ID")
```

#üìà Feed vs Milk Yield Relationship

```{r}
milk_data %>%
ggplot(aes(x = feed_kg, y = milk_yield)) +
geom_point(alpha = 0.6, color = "darkgreen") +
geom_smooth(method = "lm", color = "black") +
theme_minimal() +
labs(title = "Feed Amount vs Milk Yield", x = "Feed (kg/day)", y = "Milk Yield (L)")
```
